verses.text: Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* feareth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* delight exceedingly \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* commandments.

\w His|strong="H3605"\w* seed \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w* upon earth: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* generation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* blessed.

\w Glory|strong="H1935"\w* \w and|strong="H5975"\w* wealth shall be \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w his|strong="H5975"\w* house: \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w his|strong="H5975"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* remaineth \w for|strong="H6666"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w* \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

\w To|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* righteous \w a|strong="H3068"\w* light \w is|strong="H3068"\w* risen up \w in|strong="H3068"\w* darkness: \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w merciful|strong="H7349"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w compassionate|strong="H7349"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w just|strong="H6213"\w*.

Acceptable is \w the|strong="H5414"\w* man \w that|strong="H2142"\w* showeth mercy \w and|strong="H5769"\w* lendeth: \w he|strong="H5414"\w* shall order \w his|strong="H5414"\w* words \w with|strong="H1285"\w* judgment:
Because \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* not \w be|strong="H1471"\w* moved \w for|strong="H5414"\w* ever.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w just|strong="H4941"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H0539"\w* everlasting remembrance: \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* not hear \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evil hearing. \w His|strong="H3605"\w* heart \w is|strong="H3027"\w* ready \w to|strong="H3027"\w* hope \w in|strong="H0539"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord:

\w His|strong="H5564"\w* heart \w is|strong="H3477"\w* strengthened, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3477"\w* not \w be|strong="H5769"\w* moved until \w he|strong="H6213"\w* look over \w his|strong="H5564"\w* enemies.

\w He|strong="H7971"\w* hath distributed, \w he|strong="H7971"\w* hath \w given|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* poor: \w his|strong="H7971"\w* justice remaineth \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: \w his|strong="H7971"\w* horn \w shall|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* exalted \w in|strong="H8034"\w* glory.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* wicked \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* see, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* angry, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* gnash \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* teeth \w and|strong="H3068"\w* pine \w away|strong="H3605"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* desire \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* perish.
